articles.content: Once upon a time, Donald Glover said that the only show that could touch his magnum opus, Atlanta, was The Sopranos. Argue that if you must, but when Atlanta was on, it was on. Some shows may be tapp… [+56897 chars]

articles.author: TMZ Staff
articles.title: Aaron Carter's Fiancée Melanie Martin Harassed by Fans Since His Death - TMZ
articles.description: Aaron Carter's fans are harassing his fiancée Melanie Martin.
articles.content:
On the heels of Aaron Carter's death, some of his fans are making life even harder for his fiancée Melanie Martin by harassing her ... and occasionally even spooking her in person.
